name: Vania Mania
description:
Mini Metroidvania-style game, get to the end and fight monsters.

Links to assets (huge thanks!):

Player warrior: https://clembod.itch.io/warrior-free-animation-set

Enemies: https://luizmelo.itch.io/monsters-creatures-fantasy

NPC character: https://luizmelo.itch.io/medieval-warrior-pack-2

Tilemap: https://vnitti.itch.io/taiga-asset-pack

Background music: https://xdeviruchi.itch.io/8-bit-fantasy-adventure-music-pack

SFX: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/rpg-audio
